import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import Calculator from './calculator' import './App.css' const App = () => { const [display, setDisplay] = useState('5') const [firstOperand, setFirstOperand] = useState(null) const [operator, setOperator] = useState(null) const [secondOperand, setSecondOperand] = useState(null) const handleButtonClick = (e) => { const value = e.target.value if (e.target.className === 'number') { setDisplay(display + value) } else if (e.target.className === 'add-button') { setFirstOperand(display) setOperator('+') setDisplay('') } } return (
) } export default App
